thread.section_title: Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A relaxing week
thread.title_full: A relaxing week - Review of Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jacquesnazaire
title: A relaxing week
text: It has been a really nice week at the Xenia. Even though it is centrally situated we did appreciate the calm inside this lovely Italian hotel. The service was top class. All the people were gentle, caring and offering a great service. The breakfast was very good and made it a real good start of the day!
